value.title: Waymo co-CEO Tekedra Mawakana on how to get self-driving taxis to the mall

value.title: Those Unassuming Exurbs That Are Just Beyond The Suburbs Are Aiming To Grow Due To AI Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: There are recent headlines that people are moving out to the exurbs, a moniker seldom used but that is increasingly becoming known. The odds are that AI self-driving cars will aid in driving the shift toward living in the exurbs.

value.title: Human vs. Artificial Intelligence in Autonomous Systems

value.title: GM's Cruise, Alphabet's Waymo win permits to offer self-driving rides to passengers in California
value.excerpt: General Motors Co's Cruise and Alphabet Inc's Waymo self-driving car subsidiaries on Thursday became the first companies to receive autonomous vehicle permits to offer rides to passengers in California.

value.title: The 7 Biggest Artificial Intelligence (AI) Trends In 2022
value.excerpt: In 2022, we will see artificial intelligence continue along the path to becoming the most transformative technology humanity has ever developed. According to Google CEO Sundar Pichai, its impact will be even greater than that of fire or electricity on our development as a species.

value.title: GM invests $300M in China’s self-driving car company Momenta
value.excerpt: General Motors is investing $300 million in China's self-driving car company Momenta. GM said Thursday that the investment will speed up the development of next-generation self-driving technologies in China.

value.title: Samsung in talks with Tesla to make next-gen self-driving chips -Korea Economic Daily
value.excerpt: Samsung Electronics is in talks with Tesla to make Tesla's next-generation self-driving chips based on Samsung's 7-nanometre chip production process, a South Korean newspaper reported on Thursday.

value.title: Tesla is in talks with Samsung to produce its next-gen Full Self-Driving chip
value.excerpt: According to a new report from Korea, Tesla is currently in talks with Samsung Electronics to produce its next-gen Full Self-Driving chip. The new chip is expected to first launch in the Tesla Cybertruck next year.
